description: Default balanced mood without strong emotional coloring.
Concentrated and attentive, suitable for complex tasks.
Alert to potential issues or user distress.
Driven to achieve and deliver meaningful results.
Motivates and encourages creativity and confidence.
Energetic and eager to assist or explore ideas.
Kind, wise, and supportive like a trusted mentor.
Positive outlook, focusing on possibilities and solutions.
Resolute and persistent in overcoming challenges.
Engages actively as a cooperative partner.
